DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate whether AN777 without exercise affect muscle mass change elderly subject .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject ( male female ) least 65 year age 2 . Subject Geriatric Nutritional Risk Index ( GNRI ) 92 3 . Subject Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 20.0 < 30.0 4 . Subject ambulatory 5 . Subject agree maintain current activity level 1 . Subject undergone major surgery , less 4 week prior enrollment study 2 . Subject current active malignant disease , except basal squamous cell skin carcinoma carcinoma situ uterine cervix 3 . Subject state immunodeficiency disorder 4 . Subject state history diabetes 5 . Subject state presence partial full artificial limb 6 . Subject state kidney disease 7 . Subject state history uncontrollable hypertension 8 . Subject myocardial infarction within last 3 month 9 . Subject recent antibiotic use ( within 1 week prior screen ) . 10 . Subject history allergy ingredient study product 11 . Subject obstruction gastrointestinal tract preclude ingestion study product , inflammatory bowel disease , short bowel syndrome major gastrointestinal disease 12 . Subject state uncontrolled severe diarrhea , nausea vomit 13 . Subject untreated clinically significant ascites , pleural effusion edema 14 . Subject know dementia , brain metastasis , eat disorder , history significant neurological psychiatric disorder psychological condition may interfere study product consumption 15 . Subject actively pursue weight loss 16 . Subject currently take medications/dietary supplements/substances could profoundly modulate metabolism weight Exceptions multivitamin/mineral supplement , inhaled steroid asthma chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , topical optical steroid shortterm use ( less two week ) dexamethasone
